sections.heading: Short title. This Article may be cited as the Chicago Board of Education District Act. References in this Article to "this Act" mean this Article.
sections.text: Short title. This Article may be cited as the Chicago Board of Education District Act. References in this Article to "this Act" mean this Article.

sections.heading: Chicago Representative School Board Districts and Subdistricts
sections.text: The City of Chicago is divided into 10 Districts, and each of those Districts is divided into 2 Subdistricts as follows:DISTRICT 1SUBDISTRICT 1ABLOCKS: 170310901001000 170310901001001 170310901001002 170310901001003 170310901001004 1703

sections.heading: Severability. The provisions of this Act are severable under Section 1.31 of the Statute on Statutes.
sections.text: Severability. The provisions of this Act are severable under Section 1.31 of the Statute on Statutes.

sections.heading: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
sections.text: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
